sentence.Network_en: And there is the dread of the unknown, above all , the awful fear of hellfire.
sentence.Network_cn: 而且还有对未知的恐惧; 尤其是对于炼狱的惧怕.

sentence.Network_en: I would go through Hellfire if I could but get free from sin at last.
sentence.Network_cn: 我决不怕到地狱里去赴汤蹈火,只要最终能够洗净罪孽.

S. uch avile fish only thrives in the horrific waters of H. hellfire Peninsula and Shadowmoon Valley . bring me back a whopper and I a happy old. man .这种可憎的鱼只在地狱火半岛和影月谷的令人恶心的污水中生长。帮我带回一只这种丑陋的生物，让。我这个。糟老头心情快活一下吧。魔兽世界。
